name: Silver Dagger
description: A small dagger made of silver, known for its effectiveness against creatures vulnerable to silver.
looks: The silver dagger has a short, thin blade with a silver sheen. The hilt is wrapped in black leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.dagger_mastery: Increases damage and critical strike chance with daggers.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy chestplate made of strong steel.
looks: The steel chestplate is a sturdy armor piece that covers the entire torso. It is made of thick steel plates that are riveted together, providing excellent protection. It has a high collar and shoulder pads for added defense.

name: Longsword
description: A versatile one-handed sword with a long blade.
looks: The longsword has a straight blade that is sharpened on both sides. It has a simple crossguard and a comfortable leather grip.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the incantation for a fireball spell. When read, it allows the user to cast a powerful fireball.
looks: The Fireball Scroll is a rolled-up parchment with ancient markings and symbols. When unfolded, the incantation for the fireball spell is revealed.

special_effects.cast_fireball: Allows the user to cast a fireball spell.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable armor made from interlocking steel plates.
looks: The Steel Plate Armor consists of several layers of steel plates that cover the entire body. It has a sleek and polished appearance, with engraved patterns along the edges and intricate designs on the chest and shoulder plates.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around the metal handle for a secure grip. The pommel is shaped like a rounded knob.

name: Steel Sword
description: A strong and durable sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight and narrow blade, with a double-edged design. The handle is wrapped in leather for a firm grip, and there is a large pommel at the end of the hilt. The blade is engraved with intricate patterns.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: Golden Longsword
description: A beautiful longsword made of pure gold, adorned with intricate engravings.
looks: The Golden Longsword is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, with a shining blade made of solid gold. The hilt is wrapped in fine leather and the pommel is shaped like a majestic eagle. The crossguard is decorated with intricate engravings of mythical creatures.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielding.

name: Leather Boots
description: A pair of sturdy leather boots that provide good protection for the feet.
looks: The leather boots have a simple design, reaching just below the knees. They are made from brown leather and have laces at the front for adjustment. The soles are thick and provide good traction.

name: Amulet of Strength
description: An amulet that enhances the wearer's physical strength.
looks: The amulet is made of a fine gold chain with a pendant in the shape of a clenched fist. The fist is made of a dark iron material and has a strong and powerful presence.

special_effects.power_strike: Increases the damage of melee attacks.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy and durable chestplate made from steel.
looks: The steel chestplate is a solid piece of armor that covers the entire chest and upper torso. It has a polished silver finish with intricate engravings along the edges.

name: Legendary Sword
description: A powerful sword with legendary status.
looks: The Legendary Sword is a longsword with a polished steel blade. It has a golden hilt adorned with intricate engravings. The blade emits a faint glow, hinting at its extraordinary power.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Increases damage and accuracy when wielding swords.

special_effects.sword_of_legend: Gives the wielder legendary status, increasing all stats temporarily.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy suit of armor made from steel plates.
looks: The armor is made up of thick steel plates, providing excellent protection for the wearer. It covers the entire body, including the torso, arms, and legs. The plates are reinforced with rivets and leather straps for added durability.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A powerful sword imbued with magical energy
looks: The Enchanted Sword has a gleaming blade made of a mysterious material, and the handle is adorned with intricate engravings. The sword emits a soft glow, and small sparks of magic dance along the blade when wielded.

special_weapon_skils.sword_mastery: Grants a bonus to Sword Mastery skill when used.

special_effects.elemental_strike: Chance to deal additional lightning damage on successful hit.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. It has a polished silver finish and a hilt wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword_fighting: Able to use advanced sword fighting techniques.
